input.sentences: it was his first time trying this dish .
the menu had plenty of tasty items listed .
i pulled my hair back before getting into the water .
output.sentences: He decided to order some takeout instead.
But then he realized his whole dinner debacle was just a dream and that he was actually on the beach with his girlfriend.
The two of them were having a great time.
But as they decided to head home, they realized the beach went on forever and they were trapped.
